column1: This cream is a good product and reasonably priced.
Used product twice daily for over 1 month and saw no visible changes. Sorry, I cannot recommend this product.

It made me break out all over face so I stopped using it and only used it for two days I did use it morning and night. Iâm not sure if I should try again in one spot like forehead, if I do Iâll come back and review again.
